price: Baraheza barahakana bivuye inyuma Aayah n’ivyemezo vyacu vyose vyerekana ko hari Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, bikerekana n’ukuri kw’Intumwa zacu, Duca Turabafata Turabahana uguhana kwa Nyenintsinzi-Mutaneshwa, Mushoboravyose.
arabic: كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ أَخۡذَ عَزِيزٖ مُّقۡتَدِرٍ

meta.transliteration: kadhabū biāyātinā kullihā fa-akhadhnāhum akhdha ʿazīzin muq'tadirin
